words.definition: Acid is a chemical that can burn or dissolve other substances.
words.example: The acid burned a hole in the piece of cloth.

words.definition: Administration is the group of people who manage an organization.
words.example: The school administration decided to change the dress code.

words.definition: Administrative relates to the management of an organization.
words.example: She has many administrative duties in her office.

words.definition: Biotechnology is the use of living things to make products.
words.example: Biotechnology is used to create new medicines and crops.

words.definition: Cholesterol is a substance in the blood that can cause heart disease.
words.example: Eating too much fat can increase your cholesterol levels.

words.definition: A coalition is a group of people or organizations working together.
words.example: The two parties formed a coalition to win the election.

words.definition: When something is deceptive, it makes you believe something that is not true.
words.example: The advertisement was deceptive and promised too much.

words.definition: Diabetes is a disease in which the body cannot control sugar levels.
words.example: He has to take insulin every day to manage his diabetes.

words.definition: To eliminate something means to get rid of it completely.
words.example: We should eliminate unnecessary waste from our homes.

words.definition: Erosion is the process by which soil or rock is destroyed by water or wind.
words.example: The erosion of the coastline is a serious problem.

words.definition: Ethics are moral principles that control a person's behavior.
words.example: The doctor's ethics would not allow him to lie to his patients.

words.definition: If something is explicit, it is stated clearly and in detail.
words.example: He gave me explicit instructions on how to finish the task.

words.definition: A framework is a set of rules or ideas used to deal with a problem.
words.example: The new law provides a framework for protecting the environment.

words.definition: To manufacture something means to make it in a factory.
words.example: The company manufactures cars and trucks.

words.definition: A mechanism is a part of a machine or a way of doing something.
words.example: The locking mechanism on the door was broken.

words.definition: To minimize something means to reduce it to the smallest possible amount.
words.example: We need to minimize our expenses this month.

words.definition: Nectar is a sweet liquid produced by flowers.
words.example: Bees collect nectar from flowers to make honey.

words.definition: A notion is an idea or a belief about something.
words.example: I had a vague notion that I had met him before.

words.definition: If you are prone to something, you are likely to experience it.
words.example: He is prone to headaches when he is stressed.

words.definition: When something is straightforward, it is easy to understand or do.
words.example: The instructions were very straightforward and easy to follow.
